translations.profileUpdateInfo: Update your account details such as name, email address and password.

translations.notFoundInfo: The page you are attempting to reach is currently not available. This may be because the page does not exist or has been moved.

translations.configurationClassInfo: To replace our design with your desired theme. Please do configuration as mention
translations.readyToGetStartedDescription: Get in touch or create an account.
translations.builtForCustomersDescription: Our components, utilities, and layouts are built with customers in mind.
translations.workSmarterNotHarderDescription: Learn more about how our product can save you time and effort in the long run!
translations.getStartedDescription: Start with a payed plan and got all features of our platform in your hands. Build a successfully project selling your products with our platform. Get your own!
translations.whatDoesItIntegrateWithDescription: You can integrate with any third-party software as you need. We offer a large APIs endpoints amount and It's own documentation to you or your developers integrate with.
translations.whatCanIDoWithPayedPlans: What can I do with payed plans?
translations.whatCanIDoWithPayedPlansDescription: With a payed plan you can do everything, since customize a layout, styles and others until integrate with a third-party software as you well.
translations.doIWillGetUpdates: Do I will get free updates?
translations.doIWillGetUpdatesDescription: Yes, of corse. All plans includes free updates to our customers, maybe excluding some new features that only will be available for payed customers.
translations.communitySupportDescription: Our community support refers to the assistance, guidance, and resources provided by a community of users, developers, and moderators to help each other with using, troubleshooting.
translations.whatYouWillGetDescription: When you purchase our services, you gain access to a robust set of powerful tools and components to help you build your next online store quickly and easily. And much more:
translations.landingPagesDescription: Create landing pages with ease. Use our landing pages builder to create landing pages with ease.
translations.landingPagesInfo: With our landing page builder, you can create professional, high-converting pages in minutes, even without design or programming experience.
translations.withLandingPageBuilderYouCan: With our landing page builder, you can:
translations.increaseYourConversionRatesInfo: Create pages optimized to convert visitors into leads and customers.
translations.generateMoreLeadsInfo: Capture qualified leads and expand your contact list.
translations.growYourSalesInfo: Increase your online sales with landing pages targeted to your products and services.
translations.promoteYourBrandInfo: Create professional landing pages that represent your brand in a positive light.
translations.startCreatingYourLandingPagesToday: Start creating your landing pages today!
translations.tryLandingPagesFree: Try it for free and see how our creator can help you achieve your marketing goals.
translations.layoutsInfo: With our layouts, you can create professional, high-converting pages in minutes, even without design or programming experience.
translations.speedUpYourWork: Speed ​​up your work and bring your ideas to life with professional, customizable layouts! Save time and start working immediately without having to create everything from scratch.
translations.customizationInfo: Adapt layouts to your brand and style.
translations.professionalQualityInfo: Get access to designs created by experienced professionals.
translations.easeOfUseInfo: Editing the layouts is easy and intuitive, even for beginners.
translations.varietyInfo: Find layouts for different purposes and occasions.
translations.layoutsInfo2: With ready-made and customizable layouts, you can create amazing designs quickly and easily!
translations.paymentsInfo: Experience the freedom to choose how to pay on our e-commerce platform! We offer a variety of payment options for your convenience:
translations.creditCardInfo: Pay safely and quickly in up to 12 interest-free installments.
translations.debitCardInfo: Debit directly from your current account with convenience.
translations.billetInfo: Pay at any bank branch or online, with up to 3 business days for clearing.
translations.pixInfo: Make instant payments 24/7, using just a QR Code.
translations.paymentsInfo2: Rest assured, your purchase is safe!
translations.paymentsInfo3: We use the best security methods to protect your data and ensure a smooth shopping experience.
translations.robustPlatformInfo: Achieve success in the digital world with a robust and complete e-commerce platform.
translations.robustPlatformInfo3: Our e-commerce platform is scalable to meet the needs of any business, from small retailers to large enterprises. Start with a basic plan and upgrade as your business grows.
translations.productCatalogInfo: Easily create and manage your products with detailed descriptions, high-quality images and videos, and variation options.
translations.personalizedShoppingExperienceInfo: Give your customers a personalized shopping experience with features like advanced search filters, product recommendations, and optimized checkout.
translations.powerfulMarketingAndPromotionsInfo: Increase your sales with integrated marketing tools such as email marketing campaigns, discount coupons and personalized promotions.
translations.efficientOrderManagementInfo: Optimize the management of your orders with tools for order tracking, issuing invoices and integration with carriers.
translations.detailedReportingInfo: Gain valuable insights into your store's performance with comprehensive reports on sales, traffic and customer behavior.
translations.securityAndReliabilityInfo: Keep your online store safe and reliable with features like two-factor authentication, protection against DDoS attacks, and data encryption.
translations.robustPlatformInfo4: We offer dedicated, personalized support to help you set up and manage your online store. Our team of experts is available to answer your questions and help you achieve success.
translations.robustPlatformInfo5: Start building your successful online store today!
translations.pricingTableDescription: Our pricing table provides you with a comprehensive overview of our plans and offers. Choose the plan that best suits your needs and start building your online store today!
translations.paymentMethodsDescription: With our payment methods, you can offers to your clients an easy and secure way to pay for your online purchases.
translations.robustPlatformDescription: Our e-commerce platform offers everything you need to create and manage a successful online store, from store creation to order and customer management.
translations.incomeDiversificationDescription: Integration with affiliate platforms allows the affiliate to promote products from different niches, increasing their chances of earning.
translations.improveCustomerExperienceDescription: With a variety of payment options, delivery methods and ease of purchase, they provide a pleasant experience and build customer loyalty.
translations.increaseYourSalesDescription: Offers different payment options, such as credit cards, bank slips, digital wallets and Pix, serve different audiences and eliminate barriers to purchasing.
translations.whoWeAreDescription: We are a comprehensive and integrated e-commerce platform offering a simplified online shopping experience. Supporting high-quality affiliate products through built-in links, our platform offers a wide range of payment options and shipping methods to meet customers' needs. With an intuitive interface and advanced customization features, we provide a fluid and secure purchasing journey for users, while offering sellers an efficient way to market and sell their products online.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.paragraph1A: This Privacy Policy refers to the personal data {company} obtain when its Users use the services provided while browsing within our virtual environment. In this Privacy Policy, it will be described how data will be collected and stored regarding Users, as well as the way in which such data may be used and stored in accordance with Law 12,965/2014 (“Civil Rights Framework for the Internet”), of the Decree 8,771/2016 and Law No. 13,709/2018 (General Data Protection Law)
privacyPolicy.paragraph1B: By accepting this Privacy Policy, it is declared that all its contents have been duly read and accepted, thus having all clauses duly validated by the User so that they are in full force.
privacyPolicy.paragraph1C: Furthermore, it is clear that this Privacy Policy may be updated at any time, at the sole discretion of the administrators of the virtual environment discussed here. However, it is clear that any and all communication will be duly communicated to Users for new acceptance so that, if they continue to use the services provided, they will automatically be agreeing to the changes made to the body of this policy.
privacyPolicy.subtitle1: Collection, Storage and Care of Collected Personal Data
privacyPolicy.paragraph2: By accepting our Privacy policy, you are granted, of your own free will, permission to collect and store Users' personal data, which will be treated as described below:
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot1: Information provided during registration may be collected throughout the use of the Services and while browsing our platform.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot2: Any navigation data will be used to enable access and know how to contact the User when necessary. In addition to being used to understand your interests, as a way of ensuring constant improvement and evolution of the services provided.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot3: Personal data may be stored in other countries where {company} or its affiliates have a presence. If such jurisdictions have different data protection laws, the commitment is made to store and care for the data in accordance with such laws and this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot4: Personal Data may be used anonymously for statistical purposes and to control and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot5: Reasonable security measures will be established to protect all personal data provided. However, we remember that there is no 100% effective security measure.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot6: Eventually, all data collected by the User during the use of the services provided may be deleted at any time the User wishes. That said, we are obliged to keep connection records for the legal period.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2Dot7: This Privacy Policy applies to all websites owned by {company} or any other page, social media, tool, software or content owned by it.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2DotA: Data from the user and their customers, email, CPF, ID, bank details, etc., are collected.
privacyPolicy.paragraph3: The fact of using the website and/or service made available confirms the User's unequivocal and unconditional consent to this Policy, including the terms of processing of their personal data. In the absence of the user's consent to this policy and the terms of processing their personal data, the User must stop using the website and/or the service provided, reserving to the administration the right to prevent said User from accessing it.
privacyPolicy.paragraph4: This environment is intended for users aged 18 (eighteen) or over. If you are under the age of 18 (eighteen) years old, you may not use or register to use this site or its services without parental permission or consent. By agreeing to this Privacy policy, you have the necessary legal capacity to comply with and be bound by this Privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.paragraph5: The sensitive and confidential nature of data and other information obtained and stored is recognized. Thus, the commitment is established to keep this information of a confidential nature confidential, without using or disclosing it without the User's authorization, except under the terms set out in the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy, as well as within the limits necessary for the execution of contractual and legal obligations, as well as to defend the interests of {company} and Users.
privacyPolicy.subtitle3: Be Careful with Information and Use of Cookies
privacyPolicy.paragraph6: O Usuário concorda que o(a) {company} poderá coletar, registrar, organizar, acumular, armazenar, atualizar, extrair, usar, transferir, incluindo transferência para outros países onde possua parceiros e/ou afiliadas, remover e destruir dados pessoais e outras informações.
privacyPolicy.paragraph7: The acts described above may be processed manually and/or using automation. This consent is valid until it is removed from the User's settings and/or until it is directly requested by the User. The request can be sent in writing to the email address: {email}
privacyPolicy.paragraph8: Within the limits of applicable legislation, {company} has the right to transfer the information provided by the User to third parties.
privacyPolicy.paragraph9: When processing personal data, the necessary legal, technical and organizational measures will be taken to protect personal data against unauthorized or accidental access, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, disposal, distribution of personal data, as well as other illegal actions in in relation to personal data in compliance with the requirements of Brazilian legislation and/or any other legislation that may be applicable. The User agrees that some of the information, including personal data, becomes publicly available when using certain services and/or the website.
privacyPolicy.paragraph10: {company} makes use of cookies. By accessing our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy. Please note that some of our website partners may use cookies.
privacyPolicy.subtitle4: Maintenance of Data by the User
privacyPolicy.paragraph11: The user has the right to request the deletion of their personal data collected during the use of the electronic environment made available at any time, using the relevant service provided by the environment itself, or through direct contact with the administration through the electronic address provided above. These rights may be restricted in the manner prescribed by Brazilian law.
privacyPolicy.paragraph12: If the User becomes aware that their personal data has been compromised, in a way that could affect their access to the electronic environment provided, they must immediately notify the administration so that all necessary security measures can be taken.
privacyPolicy.paragraph13: The User is solely responsible for their actions related to the use of the website and/or services made available, meaning that if such actions result in violation of the rights and legitimate interests of third parties, as well as failure to comply with Brazilian legislation, the User agrees to compensate for losses caused to {company} and/or third parties as a result of the non-performance or poor performance of the User's obligations under this Policy and/or the legislation.
privacyPolicy.paragraph14: The User uses the Services at their own risk, being solely responsible for losses incurred as a result of misuse by the Company's environment and/or services.
privacyPolicy.paragraph15: The {company} cooperates with the competent authorities and third parties to ensure compliance with laws, safeguard the integrity and security of the Platform and its users, and prevent conduct that harms the moral integrity and honor of the individuals or legal entities involved.
privacyPolicy.paragraph16: The provisions of this Policy are governed by the laws of Brazil. If, for one reason or another, one or more provisions of this Policy are considered invalid, this does not affect the remaining provisions.
privacyPolicy.paragraph17: For all questions, the User can send a request to the company's address to the following account: {email}

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Use Conditions
termsAndConditions.paragraph1: This Term refers to {company}. By browsing this website and using the services that are provided, you ACKNOWLEDGE that you READ, UNDERSTAND and AGREE with our Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions cover all applications, Internet services or extensions of related websites. If you do not agree or a point is not clear, we suggest that you DO NOT BROWSE IT FURTHER until you have resolved all your doubts. You can also, at any time, return to the website, click on terms of use and re-read them as many times as you wish.
termsAndConditions.paragraph2: The {company} Terms and Conditions govern your use of this Site and all of its content ("Site"). These Terms describe the rules and regulations that guide the use of {company} located via the URL link {url}. All materials/information/documents/services or all other entities (collectively referred to as "content") appearing on {url} will be managed in accordance with these Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditions.paragraph2A: WARNING: Do not continue to use this website if you have any objection to any of the provisions of the Terms and Conditions stated on this page.
termsAndConditions.paragraph3: The website is intended for users who are 18 (eighteen) years of age or older. If you are under the age of 18 (eighteen) years old, you may not use or register to use this site or its services without parental permission or consent. By agreeing to these Terms and Conditions, you have the necessary legal capacity to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditions.paragraph4: {company} makes use of cookies. By accessing our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy. Please note that some of our website partners may use cookies.
termsAndConditions.paragraph5: {company} owns the intellectual property rights to all content. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access any content on the website for your own personal use subject to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. {company} hereby determines that the user of the website does not commit the following actions:
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot1: Reproduce, republish, duplicate or copy any content {company} for any purpose;
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot2: Sell, rent, sublicense and/or otherwise commercialize any content from {company};
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot3: Perform and/or publicly display any content from {company};
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot4: Using this website in a way that is, or may be, damaging and/or affecting user access to this website;
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot5: Use this website contrary to the relevant rules, laws and regulations of your country of residence, or in a way that causes, or may cause, harm to the website, or to any person or business entity;
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot6: Carry out data mining or any other similar activity in connection with this website, or while using this website; It is
termsAndConditions.paragraph5Dot7: Using this website to engage in any form of business advertising or marketing.
termsAndConditions.paragraph6: Specific areas of this website may be restricted from user access, and {company} may further extend such restriction to the entire website, at any time and in its sole discretion. Any user identification, security key or password you may have on this site is confidential and you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of this information.
termsAndConditions.paragraph7: We reserve the right to register requests that you remove all links or any specific link created by you that redirect to our Website, and you approve immediate removal of any such links to our Website upon request.
termsAndConditions.paragraph8: We may change the terms and conditions of these linking rights at any time. By continually linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow the terms of this linking policy.
termsAndConditions.paragraph9: Please contact us if you find any link on our Website that is offensive and we may consider and review requests to remove such links.
termsAndConditions.paragraph10: This website may contain links to websites or applications operated by third parties. We do not control any of these third-party websites or applications or the third-party operator. This Site, the subject of these Terms of Use, is not responsible for and does not endorse any third-party websites or applications or their availability or content.
termsAndConditions.paragraph10A: {company} is not responsible for the advertisements contained on the website. You agree to do so at your own risk when purchasing any goods and/or services from any third party. The advertiser remains responsible for such goods and/or services, and if you have any questions or complaints about them, you should contact the advertiser.
termsAndConditions.paragraph11: It is important to note that the term used “User Content” means any audio, video, text, images or other material or content that you choose to display on this Site. With respect to User Content, by displaying it, you grant to {company} a non-exclusive, worldwide, irrevocable, royalty-free, sub-licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any media.
termsAndConditions.paragraph12: Your User Content must be your own and must not infringe the rights of any third party. {company} reserves the right to remove any of your content from this website at any time without notice. {company} is permitted to monitor your activities on the Website and remove any user content that is deemed inappropriate, offensive, contrary to applicable laws and regulations, or causes a breach of these Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditions.paragraph13: When accessing this Site, specific information about the User, such as Internet protocol (IP) addresses, website navigation, user software and browsing time, together with other similar information, will be stored on the servers of {company}. Information about your identities such as name, address, contact details, billing information and other information stored on this website will be strictly used for statistical purposes only and will not be published for general access. {company}, however, assumes no responsibility for the security of this information.
termsAndConditions.paragraph14: The website is provided, with all liabilities and makes no express or implied commitments, representations or warranties of any kind relating to this website or the content contained therein.
termsAndConditions.paragraph15: The user agrees to indemnify the Site and its affiliates to the fullest extent against all actions, claims, liabilities, losses, damages, costs, demands and expenses arising from the use of this Site by the User, including, without limitation, any claim related violation of any of the provisions of these Terms and Conditions. If you are dissatisfied with any or all of the content of this website or any or all of its Terms and Conditions, you may discontinue use of this website.
termsAndConditions.paragraph16: At any time, users can stop using the Site for this purpose, the necessary guidelines are available on the site. If you still have any questions, don't hesitate to send an email to {email}.
termsAndConditions.paragraph17: We reserve the right and sole discretion, and without prior notice or liability, to deny access to and use of the Site (including blocking specific IP addresses) to any user for any reason, including but not limited to violation of any representation, warranty or agreement in these Terms or any applicable law or regulation.
termsAndConditions.paragraph18: The Terms and Conditions of this website shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country or state in which the Website operates. You hereby unconditionally submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Brazil for the resolution of any disputes.
termsAndConditions.paragraph19: This Site reserves the right to revise these Terms at any time as it sees fit. Therefore, it is essential that your users are aware of these changes.
termsAndConditions.paragraph20: The Site reserves the right to assign, transfer and subcontract its rights and/or obligations under this Agreement without any prior notice or consent required. Users will not be permitted to assign, transfer or subcontract any of their rights and/or obligations under these Terms. Furthermore, a person who is not a party to these Terms and Conditions shall not have the right to enforce any provision contained therein.
termsAndConditions.paragraph21: These Terms and Conditions, including any legal notices and disclaimers on this website, constitute the entire agreement between the Website and you in relation to your use of this website. Ultimately, this Agreement supersedes all prior agreements and understandings relating to this Agreement.
termsAndConditions.paragraph22: If you have any questions, please contact us via email: {email}.
